name: ArtifactoryToolsInstaller
description: Installs tools necessary for all Artifactory integration tasks.
author: JFrog

inputs.name: artifactoryService
inputs.label: Artifactory service
inputs.helpMarkDown: Artifactory service to download tools from. The service should proxy Bintray, to allow downloading the tools.

inputs.name: cliInstallationRepo
inputs.label: Install JFrog CLI from:
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Sets the repository from which the JFrog CLI should be downloaded and installed.
The repository has to be of type Remote (or Virtual that includes a Remote), pointing to "https://jfrog.bintray.com/jfrog-cli-go/".

inputs.name: installCustomVersion
inputs.label: Install custom version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to install a specific version of JFrog CLI.

inputs.name: cliVersion
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify the version of JFrog CLI to install.
You can also use $(jfrogCliVersion) as the value.

inputs.name: installExtractors
inputs.label: Install Maven and Gradle Extractors
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Select to make the JFrog Cli install the Maven and Gradle Extractors from Artifactory.
The Maven and Gradle Extractors are used by the 'Artifactory Maven' and 'Artifactory Gradle' tasks.

inputs.name: extractorsInstallationRepo
inputs.label: From:
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Sets the repository from which the Maven and Gradle Extractors should be downloaded and installed.
The repository has to be of type Remote (or Virtual that includes a Remote), pointing to "https://jcenter.bintray.com".
